name: Stop Trump - President Race Fun Games
name_original: Stop Trump - President Race Fun Games
description:
Stop trump is a fun way to raise attention to all of Trump’s bad ideas!

If you don't want the great wall of mexico, if you are against making immigration rules about religion or simply don't want trump to be president, download de app and spread the word.

Fun mini games!

Trump or Homer Simpson, guess who said the phrase, and much more.
